root.description: The Witcher IV: Days of Night
root.hint: Geralt: "So this is what a hint looks like. Guess I'll @go^ into the #woods^."

exit.description: As day draws to its close, you walk under the eaves of the dark #woods^ in the land of Toussaint.
exit.onCheck: Night lays thick under the trees of the #woods^.

prop.description: The windows of the houses in the #village^ behind you are aglow with candle light.
prop.onCheck: The homes look warm on this chill night.
